section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para: Protocol changes in GRAM since GTpreviousversion series:

listitem.simpara: The Java WS Core Framework has been updated from the draft versions of the WSRF/WSN and WS Addressing specifications to the final versions WSRF 1.2, WSN 1.3 and WS Addressing 1.0. There is no backward compatibility between this version and any previous versions.
